claim: Edge Runtime functions must begin sending a response within 25 seconds or fail.
scope: Applies to all Vercel Edge Functions and Next.js routes using `runtime: 'edge'`.

evidence.excerpt: Functions must begin sending a response within 25 seconds to maintain streaming.
evidence.note: Hard timeout limit for Edge Runtime execution.

counterEvidence.excerpt: You may continue streaming a response beyond 25 seconds.
counterEvidence.note: Workaround allows background processing after initial response.
